data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Urawa at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Kengo Nakamura (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 4, Free kick Kawasaki.
Yasuto Wakizaka of Kawasaki gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 7, Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
In the minute 10, Urawa have been awarded a penalty...
Shinzo Koroki nets and Urawa now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 13, Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki are coming forward and Yasuto Wakizaka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 18, Kaoru Mitoma (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki's Kengo Nakamura has run offside.
Hidemasa Morita (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Urawa.
Urawa drive forward but Shinzo Koroki is judged offside.
Kawasaki's Kengo Nakamura misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 29, Urawa to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Kawasaki takes a corner from the left.
Jesiel (Kawasaki) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Urawa at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Urawa.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Kaoru Mitoma gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Urawa defender.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 42, Jesiel (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki are pushing forward but Kyohei Noborizato's finish is wide of the goal.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Urawa.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Kawasaki takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 47, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Miki Yamane of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Hidemasa Morita.
Kaoru Mitoma with an assist there.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kawasaki's Akihiro Ienaga misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
Kazuki Nagasawa is on a sub for Hidetoshi Takeda for Urawa.
Kawasaki pushes forward through Yasuto Wakizaka, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 59, Goal! Kawasaki take a 2-1 lead through a well-placed header from Kaoru Mitoma.
Great play from Miki Yamane to set up the goal.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 3-1 through Yu Kobayashi.
In the minute 61, Kengo Nakamura instrumental with a fine assist.
Urawa make their second substitution with Ewerton replacing Yuki Abe.
The away team replace Tomoya Ugajin with Ryosuke Yamanaka.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kaoru Mitoma for Kawasaki is whistled offside.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 66, In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Kawasaki drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 70, Yu Kobayashi (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Kawasaki.
Kenyu Sugimoto is replacing Shinzo Koroki for the away team.
In the minute 72, Koya Yuruki is on a sub for Quenten Martinus for Urawa.
Kawasaki drives forward and Akihiro Ienaga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Urawa drive upfield and Ryosuke Yamanaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kawasaki defender.
In the minute 79, Urawa takes a corner from the left.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
The home team replace Yu Kobayashi with Leandro Damiao.
In the minute 80, Kawasaki make their second substitution with Reo Hatate replacing Yasuto Wakizaka.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Urawa needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
Urawa are pushing forward but Daiki Hashioka's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 87, Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Ao Tanaka is replacing Akihiro Ienaga for the home team.
Throw-in for Urawa at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 89, Urawa to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leandro Damiao of Kawasaki gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Urawa.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ewerton (Urawa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kawasaki make their fourth substitution with Tatsuya Hasegawa replacing Kaoru Mitoma.
